name: Lentigen
overview: Lentigen Corporation, a biotechnology company, engages in the development and commercialization of gene delivery technologies for human disease. It provides lentiviral vector technology for a range of therapeutic, vaccine, and research applications in biotechnology and medicine. The company offers LG690, a cell therapy for treatment of graft vs hot diseases; LG768, a cancer vaccine for the treatment of leukemia; stem cell therapy to prevent and treat medical disorders; LG631, a treatment that makes chemotheraphy for brain cancer less toxic; LG889, a steam cell therapy for hemophilia; LG611, an exact strain matched influenza vaccine for pandemic flu; LG811, an exact strain matched influenza vaccine for seasonal flu; LG747, a biosimilar erytho poieitin; and LG888, a novel factor VIII protein therapy for Hemophilia A. Lentigen Corporation was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Gaithersburg, Maryland.

relationships.title: Founder President and Chief Scientific Officer
